item.title: Recent Developments in Control-Flow Integrity
item.author: hello@eiken.dev (eikendev)
item.description: I was a bit busy in the past few months, but now I’m back to talk about some system security. During my Bachelor’s studies, I did a bit of reading on Control-Flow Integrity (CFI). Recently, I’ve stumbled upon a paper on CFI, and while giving it a read I found myself in the need of refreshing the basics. I thought I could use this opportunity to tell you about CFI and what current research is trying to achieve.
